testsuite.name: Orc::LiveModelCreator

testcase.name: Orc::LiveModelCreator gives sensible error message when cmdb info is missing
Orc::LiveModelCreator combines the results from the remote_client with the cmdb information
Orc::LiveModelCreator raises an error when there is no cmdb information for the given group
